title: Braun Series 7 shaver - OptiFoil™
description: The OptiFoil™ is the most advanced foil from Braun. The unique geometry with ergonomically sized holes allows to capture more hair and cut them deeper than ever before. Braun has over 50 years of foil evolution experience culminating in our unique OptiFoil™.

asset.title: Braun Series 7 shaver - OptiFoil™

The OptiFoil™ is the most advanced foil from Braun. The unique geometry with ergonomically sized holes allows to capture more hair and cut them deeper than ever before. Braun has over 50 years of foil evolution experience culminating in our unique OptiFoil™.

transcripts: Braun's most advanced OptiFoil. Ergonomically designed foil holes. Consistently capture hair all over the foil to cut hair deeper than ever before. Braun Series 7.
